entry.title: Markdown(II)
entry.content: Something about Markdown(II) II. The grammar of MarkdownTitleThere are six level heading in Markdown, and every heading needs one space before the title. The picture above clearly show the grammar of the title. ListIn Markdown, the display of list just needs “-“ or “*”, which is formed of unordered list. As for the ordered list, you just need add “1.”, “2.”,and “3.” before words. The picture under the passage clearly show it. QuoteIf you want yo quote something to your essay, you just need to insert “>” before the word. Picture and LinkThe grammar of inserting picture and link is similar. The difference between them is “!”.By the way, I use this website to store my pictures. Bold and ItalicThe grammar of bold and italic is simple. The picture under the passage clearly show it.

entry.title: Markdown(I)
entry.content: Something about Markdown(I) Introduction Markdown is a light weight language, which has many merits. If you want to learn about more details, please click here.I will briefly introuduce the grammar of this language and my feel. I.About Markdown We can learn from the introduction that the Markdown is a light weight language. This language focuses on the simple grammar instead of the complex composing, which makes us concentrate on writting itself rather than optimizing the structure. What’s more, many editors and websites support this language, such as sublime ,jianshu and so on. Last but not least, when you finish the task with Markdown, the format of exportation could be varied. The official document of Markdown You can refer to more information with the below websites. http://markdown-here.com/ http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax http://wowubuntu.com/markdown/#list The merits of Markdown Focus on your content instead of composing. Easily export files with the format of HTML, PDF and md. Have a simple grammar and easy to learn. The tool of MarkdownI strongly suggest Mou and Macdown, if you are using the Mac. And also, MarkdownPad and MarkPad are very suuitable for Windows.

entry.title: Preface
entry.content: First of all, I am very grateful for the help of Dropar, who is my roommate and give me lots of helpful suggestions for my website. And of course, the process of building my website is very hard. I have spent almost a week building mt website. If anyone has some trouble, you can contact me with my Wechat ID: Wangbin-matthew. Finally, make a brief introuduction of my website. My website records some of my experiences and what I am learning now. If website has some mistakes, please contact me immediately. And also I am very happy to communicate with each other and make progress togehter.
